## TextElementsRenderer.renderText() method

Render the text using the specified camera into the current canvas.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
renderText(camera: THREE.OrthographicCamera): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  camera | THREE.OrthographicCamera | Orthographic camera to use. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
